requirements.text: In the Pricing page (`frontend/src/pages/Pricing.tsx`), move the 'Most Popular for Freelancers' badge/label so it is rendered inside the Starter plan column (e.g., above the plan title or as an inline chip within the card), rather than floating outside or above the column boundary.

quotes: ensure the Most Popular for Freelancers is shown inside the column of Starter pack

acceptanceCriteria: The 'Most Popular for Freelancers' label/badge is visually contained within the Starter plan card boundaries.
The badge does not overlap with adjacent plan columns.
The Starter card layout remains consistent and readable on desktop and mobile viewports.
